apps.name: UTM
apps.subtitle: Virtual machines for iOS (with JIT support)
apps.localizedDescription:
UTM is a full featured virtual machine host for iOS. In short, it allows you to run Windows, Android, and more on your iPhone and iPad.
This version requires using AltJIT. Install UTM SE for slower emulation without JIT.


More information at https://getutm.app/

Features:

• Emulate any Processor
30+ processors supported by qemu including x86_64, ARM64, and RISC-V
• Run any Operating System
Windows, Linux, and more natively and securely on iOS within an App
• Fast Emulation
Para-virtualization with SPICE and JIT compilation with TCG
• High Compatibility
iOS 14+ supported. Works on iPhone and iPad. No jailbreak needed
• Free and Open Source
UTM and its dependencies are all free and open source
• Easy to Use
Configure and customize your VM in a native UI

privacy.name: LocalNetwork
privacy.usageDescription: The virtual machine may access the local network. UTM also uses the local network to communicate with AltServer.

privacy.name: LocationAlwaysAndWhenInUse
privacy.usageDescription: UTM requests location data periodically to ensure the system keeps the background process active. Location data will never leave the device.

privacy.name: LocationAlways
privacy.usageDescription: UTM requests location data periodically to ensure the system keeps the background process active. Location data will never leave the device.

privacy.name: LocationWhenInUse
privacy.usageDescription: UTM requests location data periodically to ensure the system keeps the background process active. Location data will never leave the device.

privacy.name: Microphone
privacy.usageDescription: Permission is required for any virtual machine to record from the microphone.

apps.name: UTM SE
apps.subtitle: Virtual machines for iOS (without JIT support)
apps.localizedDescription:
UTM is a full featured virtual machine host for iOS. In short, it allows you to run Windows, Android, and more on your iPhone and iPad.
This version runs on all iOS 14+ devices but lacks JIT support and is slower than regular UTM.


More information at https://getutm.app/

Features:

• Emulate any Processor
30+ processors supported by qemu including x86_64, ARM64, and RISC-V
• Run any Operating System
Windows, Linux, and more natively and securely on iOS within an App
• Fast Emulation
Para-virtualization with SPICE and JIT compilation with TCG
• High Compatibility
iOS 14+ supported. Works on iPhone and iPad. No jailbreak needed
• Free and Open Source
UTM and its dependencies are all free and open source
• Easy to Use
Configure and customize your VM in a native UI

privacy.usageDescription: The virtual machine may access the local network. UTM also uses the local network to communicate with AltServer.

privacy.name: LocationAlwaysAndWhenInUse
privacy.usageDescription: UTM requests location data periodically to ensure the system keeps the background process active. Location data will never leave the device.

privacy.usageDescription: UTM requests location data periodically to ensure the system keeps the background process active. Location data will never leave the device.

privacy.usageDescription: UTM requests location data periodically to ensure the system keeps the background process active. Location data will never leave the device.
